## Purpose
<p> Show the trend of the new cases or test cases vs date for Covid 19 data.
User Can choose the case type like all cases, undergraduate cases, graduate cases or faculty cases. Also, user can choose the given date from 2020,08,17 until 2021,11,17.
The plot will show the trend for given period accordingly </p>

## Data
illinois_shield_covid_data.csv file
